member.name: T:Blazorise.Snackbar.Constants
member.summary: Defines the snackbar constant values.

member.name: F:Blazorise.Snackbar.Constants.DefaultIntervalBeforeClose
member.summary: Defines the default interval(in milliseconds) after which the snackbar will be automatically closed.

member.summary: Defines the default interval(in milliseconds) by which the snackbar will be delayed from closing.

member.summary: Defines the default animation duration in milliseconds.

member.summary: Specifies the reason that a snackbar was closed.

member.name: F:Blazorise.Snackbar.SnackbarCloseReason.None
member.summary: Snackbar is closed automatically by internal timer or by other unknown reason.

member.name: F:Blazorise.Snackbar.SnackbarCloseReason.UserClosed
member.summary: Snackbar is closed by the user.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Snackbar.Snackbar
member.summary: Snackbars provide brief messages about app processes. The component is also known as a toast.

member.summary: Indicates if snackbar is visible.

member.summary: Indicates if snackbar can show multiple lines of text.

member.summary: Snackbar location.

member.summary: Snackbar color.

member.name: F:Blazorise.Snackbar.Snackbar.countdownTimer
member.summary: Timer used to countdown the close event.

member.summary: A flag that indicates if the snackbar close action was delayed.

member.name: F:Blazorise.Snackbar.Snackbar.closeReason
member.summary: Holds the last received reason for snackbar closure.

member.summary: Hides the snackbar.

member.summary: Allow snackbar to show multiple lines of text.

member.summary: Defines the snackbar location.

member.summary: Defines the base animation duration in milliseconds.

member.summary: Holds the snackbar message state.

member.summary: Custom key for snack bar message.

member.summary: Custom snackbar template to render.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Snackbar.SnackbarOptions.ShowCloseButton
member.summary: Flag that indicates if close button will be visible.

member.summary: Custom close button text.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Snackbar.SnackbarOptions.CloseButtonIcon
member.summary: Custom close button icon. Can be either enum or string eg. "fa-times".

member.name: P:Blazorise.Snackbar.SnackbarOptions.ShowActionButton
member.summary: Flag that indicates if action button will be visible.

member.summary: Custom action button text.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Snackbar.SnackbarOptions.ActionButtonIcon
member.summary: Custom action button icon. Can be either enum or string eg. "fa-times".

member.summary: Time in millisecond for snackbar animation.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Snackbar.SnackbarOptions.IntervalBeforeClose
member.summary: Time in millisecond until snackbar is automatically closed.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Snackbar.SnackbarOptions.Multiline
member.summary: Defines if the snackbar will contain multiple lines.

member.summary: Defines the snackbar stack location.

member.summary: If clicked on snackbar, a close action will be delayed by increasing the time.

member.summary: Defines the interval(in milliseconds) by which the snackbar will be delayed from closing.

member.summary: Defines a text to show for snackbar close button. Leave as null to not show it!

member.summary: Defines an icon to show for snackbar close button. Leave as null to not show it!

member.summary: Defines an icon to show for snackbar action button. Leave as null to not show it!
